name: .UDS File Extension
summary: Learn about .UDS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Sierra Generations, a program that stores family tree data; contains names, dates, ancestors, and descendants.

content: Sierra Generations is no longer a supported program. UDS files can be converted using services provided by TWR Computing.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
